summary: An ordinance relating to the Engineering Department, authorizing the widening of 15th Avenue West, the construction of the grade separations or traffic interchanges at 15th Avenue West and the south approach to the Ballard Bridge, and at 15th Avenue West and West Dravus Street, and certain other work, all in connection with the program of arterial betterment contemplated by, and making an appropriation from Seattle General Arterial Improvement Bonds 1954 Fund therefor.
committee: Public Safety, Streets & Sewers, Finance and City Utilities
